entry.title: Simple steps to a personal blog
entry.summary:
This personal blog is constructed on the following components:

  • Github Pages
  • Pelican
  • Markdown

Why Pelican ?

Well, there are certainly many other excellent choices like Jekyll. While for someone with a heavy reliance on Python, Pelican constitutes a better tool.

Software Setup

To start, one needs to install Pelican, Markdown and one Markdown Editor. 

pip install pelican
pip install Markdown

For MAC users, the best Markdown editor is Mou. For Windows uders, MarkdownPad is perhaps the most siutable one.

a repository on Github with the name username.github.io . Clone this repository in your working directory in the computer:

git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git

$ git push https://github.com/zhwa/zhwa.github.io.git
